area_name: Big Orange Block (aka The Spear Head), The

content.description: Start on a high, small left hand crimp and a good right hand side pull, technical foot moves on small greasy holds and a long reach is required to gain a high left Side pull, traverse under the roof to the right on sparse, slick feet maneuvering through side pulls and one flat crimp. Once at the orange patina there’s a blind reach for a hold and a mantle onto the orange patina “Slab” and you’re done
content.location: Starts to the right of Old school problem 2, and traverses the blank section in the middle and then across the face of Old school problem 1 and finishes straight up

climbs.name: Old School Problem  5 AKA The North Arête

content.description: Climb short fun arête and top out on either the left side or better yet, hand traverse lip off top right of arête for days.
content.location: Obvious short sweet arête on north side of boulder.

climbs.name: Old School Problem  3 AKA  Southwest Arête

content.description: Super technical arête with old aid seam.
content.location: Obvious southwest arête with old aid line just left of arête.

climbs.name: Old School Problem  2 AKA South Arête.

content.description: Super classic slab/thin/edgey climb with sporty roof encounter.
content.location: Obvious arête with roof located on south side of boulder.

content.description: Classic old school highball glassy slab test piece with lip encounter. Excellent edging on glassy holds with a big move up and right to great jug at the lip.
content.location: Predominate line on south side of boulder 5 feet right of the South Arête.

content.description: Great technical high ball problem in the middle of the north face. Much harder and beta intensive than it appears.
content.protection: Good landing pads useful, this one is definitely OTD.

content.description: A cluster of low easy problems that are more commonly down climbs. These may be obvious to some, but every time I visit this boulder there are a few first timers struggling to find their way up. Hope this helps a little.
content.location: Back side of Big Orange. Between the glassy slab and old school arete problem 5.

pathTokens: Big Orange Block (aka The Spear Head), The
